tasks.title: Morning Briefing

News: Kimi Code debuts (terminal companion to Kimi K2.5), VS Code AI Toolkit v0.30.0 (Tool Catalog + Agent Inspector), GPT 5.2 vs Opus 4.5 vs Gemini 3 Pro comparison. MTB: BC Bike Fest new races launched, Epic 8 getting rave reviews (Flight Attendant). Kettlebell: Hybrid Strength Flow trend for 2026. Snow: Fresh powder at Snoqualmie Pass (snow this morning + afternoon, temps ~30Â°F). Reddit: XC race schedules, Epic 8 builds, S&S progression, wheel strategy CSP closing debates. Offered: FE quality dashboard spec, Dash Point race intel compilation, kettlebell progression audit.
